snippet: Mr. Segal, who made his fortune with the Segal Company, an international consulting business, remained a larger-than-life presence on New York’s cultural scene well into his 90s.
abstract: Martin E Segal, one of New York City's leading cultural figures and elder statesman of Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts, dies at age 96.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Segal, who made his fortune with the Segal Company, an international consulting business, remained a larger-than-life presence on New York’s cultural scene well into his 90s.

headline.seo: Martin Segal, Leading New York Cultural Figure, Dies at 96
headline.main: Martin E. Segal, Titan of the Arts in New York City, Dies at 96
